flawed_nl_solution:
Karen makes $3000 / (3/4) = $<<3000/(3/4)=4000>>4000 per month.
In three months, Karen would make a total of $4000 * 3 = $<<4000*3=21000>>21000.
To make the same amount of money John would need to work $21000 / $3000 = <<21000/3000=7>>7 months.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12000, not 21000. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
